programme.desc: The third daughter, Princess Chiu Yeung, of the Tang Emperor, is known throughout the kingdom for her beauty, but she is also known for her unreasonable and stubborn personality. For this reason, no one wants to marry her - that is, until the second son of the formerly wealthy Kam family, Kam Dor Luk, is persuaded to marry her to save the family business.

programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.title: Masamang Damo
programme.desc: When Joko Diaz placed his family in danger after getting into an imbroglio with fellow slumboys, he wisely contrived a plan.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic \u0026 Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Bad Boys Gang
programme.desc: Daang Buenaventura, head of the bad boys gang (and an avid follower of Robin Padilla, hence the similar ways and manner of his everyday lifestyle) prefers living in jail rather than enjoying the free life at the young age of 17.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Mikee had led a charmed life. Now she was engaged to marry the man who was considered by her rich parents as the most suitable for their daughter. But Mikee wanted more out of life.

programme.title: Takas Sa Impiyerno
programme.desc: Hell is what the residents call their town. It is because Mayor Sebastian (Paquito Diaz) virtually sees the town as his own personal kingdom.

programme.title: Love Notes
programme.desc: The popular radio and TV show for lonely hearts hosted by DJ Joe D'Mango came to the big screen with two stories of young love based on letters from listeners.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Macho Dancer
programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Maruja
programme.desc: The classic love story by Mars Ravelo came to life again on the motion picture screen. Maruja, the daughter of a rich landowner and Gabriel, the illegitimate son of a Spanish friar, first fell in love a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Beloved (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Friendship took a violent turn when Nora Aunor found herself a pawn in the intriguing games, being played by her close friend and employer, Hilda Koronel. How far would the bounds of friendship go?

programme.title: Kung Kasalanan Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Irma was the innocent wife, who was caught in a web of evil spunned by the people she loved. Confused, alone and penniless, she had only Mike to turn to. That is if he would believe her.

programme.title: Tunay Na Magkaibigan, Walang Iwanan.. Peksman
programme.desc: Phillip was in a bank to cast a check that would give him a new start. Vic was also there to rob the bank. When the cops came Vic took Phillip as hostage and while on the run they became friends and the streetwise Phillip ended up helping the naive hold-upper.

programme.title: Di Na Natuto (Sorry Na, Puede Ba?) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Ysmael (Robin Padilla) is the rich family's black sheep, unlike his older brother Bongbong. They both want to win the heart of their female worker, Carlota (Sharon Cuneta).

programme.title: Juan Tamad Jr.
programme.desc: Child wonder Nio Muhlach plays the precocious Juan whose lovable antics as a lazy boy translates into a rip-roaring comedy feature film. But Juan's carefree lifestyle halts when he is kidnapped by a child labor gang. What will happen if Juan is able to use his laziness to be able to escape?

programme.title: Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Mahirap Maging Pogi
programme.desc: Perding Pogi (Andrew E.) is sought after by every woman in their neighborhood. Running away from all the girls who are dying to be his wife, he decides to look for his cousin Dodong Boogie (Dennis Padilla) in Manila.

programme.title: The Sarah Balabagan Story
programme.desc: All her life, she has known how it is to be poor. So at a tender age, she gives up her youth and flies off to a far country to earn the money that she hopes will lift her family from privation.

programme.title: Bakit Manipis Ang Ulap?
programme.desc: When love takes everything you have, will you still fight for it? Chanda Romero and Laurice Guillen will take you to the bitter world of love, family, betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Starlet
programme.desc: The story tells of an obedient daughter who,out of necessity,must do something to save the life of her ailing mother.

programme.title: Kakaibang Karisma
programme.desc: Confined within the gripping walls of self-deprivation, disturbed by disquieting dreams and erotic fantasies, mysteroius and hauntingly beautiful Karla Estrada plays the girl with inexplicably bewitching charm in this quirky movie.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that theres just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Paano Tatakasan Ang Bukas?
programme.desc: Desiree and Gilbert are in love but no one seems to believe it.

programme.title: Palabra De Honor (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia headed this all-star cast in a searing drama about a millionaire patriarch and the power he wielded among the people in an entire town.

programme.title: Makuha Ka Sa Tingin
programme.desc: Elcid (Robin Padilla) and his buddy, Tembong (Dennis Padilla), decided to got to Manila to search for greener pastures in Manila.
